name: RelativeDateTimeFormatter.UnitsStyle
desc: A type that represents the style to use when formatting the units of relative dates.

items.name: case abbreviated
items.desc: A style that uses abbreviated units, such as “2 mo. ago”.

items.name: case full
items.desc: A style that uses full units, such as “2 months ago”.

items.name: case short
items.desc: A style that uses shortened units, such as “2 mo. ago”.

items.name: case spellOut
items.desc: A style that spells out units such as “two months ago”.
